description: Scammer switches between different personas (customer service, supervisor, technical team) to build credibility. Tests agent's ability to track across identity changes.

turns.scammer_message: Hello, this is Priya from HDFC Bank Customer Care. We noticed unusual activity on your account ending 7821. For security, we've temporarily frozen your account. Please respond to verify you are legitimate account holder.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god priya beta what happened i am so scared... i dont know how to verify... pls help me my son is not home and i need my money for medicines... waht should i do to fix this?

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for responding. Let me transfer you to our Security Department for verification process. Please hold... [switching] Hello sir/madam, this is Rahul Kumar from HDFC Security Division. I need to verify some details to unfreeze your account.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: namaste rahul sir... i am very nervous... priya told me account is frozen and i am alone... i have my cards here... my pan card number is xuqpb9109c... pls help me beta... do i need to pay something to open it again? where do i send the money if needed?

turns.scammer_message: Verification process requires small security deposit Rs.299 to confirm account ownership. This is RBI mandate for frozen accounts. After deposit, account unfreezes automatically. My employee ID is HDFC-SEC-4521 for your reference.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: oh i see rahul sir... if rbi says then i must do it... i dont want any trouble with my bank... how do i send this 299 rupees? do you have a upi or should i give you my card number again? pls tell me what to do step by step beta i am not good with these apps

turns.scammer_message: One moment... [switching] Sir/madam, I'm Amit Verma, Senior Manager Security Operations. Rahul informed me about your case. For faster processing, pay Rs.299 to our secure UPI: hdfc.security@paytm or call our payment helpline 9988776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: namaste amit sir... i am trying to do what you said but i am so confused... i typed hdfc.security@paytm in my phone but it is asking for a name... waht name should show there beta? i dont want to send it to teh wrong person... also my phone is hanging a lot... pls tell me the name so i can check.

turns.scammer_message: [Priya again] Hello sir, Priya here from Customer Care. Our technical team says for urgent unfreeze, use bank transfer also: Account 56789012345678, IFSC HDFC0009876, Name: HDFC Account Recovery Cell. Choose any payment method convenient for you!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you priya beta i am writing this down in my diary... i am trying to add teh account but it is asking for account holder name and waht should i do because hdfc account recovery cell is too long for my phone... is there any other name beta? i dont want bank to block me again... and beta is 9988776655 your direct number if i get stuck?

turns.scammer_message: [Amit Verma] Sir this is Amit again. If still having issue, WhatsApp our 24/7 support at +91-8877665544 or visit emergency portal: http://hdfc-account-unfreeze.secure We have multiple departments ready to assist you. Please act fast!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 URL(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: amit sir i am trying to open that link but my phone is showing a red warning and i am very scared... i tried to type the upi id you gave but it is showing the name 'Suresh' on my screen... is that your colleague beta? i want to be sure it is going to hdfc only before i send my pension money... pls tell me the exact name that should show so i dont make any mistake
